title: Programming Basics with C++
description: Course introduces foundational programming concepts using the C++ language.
moreDescription: The Programming Basics with C++ course provides essential programming skills required for all tech specialties at SoftUni. It focuses on beginner-level coding, utilizing an Integrated Development Environment (IDE), and foundational concepts such as variables, data types, operators, expressions, input/output operations, conditional statements (if, if-else), and loops (for, while).
certificateImage: Image/Certificate-Image/Programming Basics with C++/Programming Basics with C++ Certificate.jpg
Image/Certificate-Image/Programming Basics with C++/Programming Basics with C++ Certificate Back.jpg
skills: Working with the console (input and output of data)
Working with loops (for)
Working with more complex logical conditions
Working with logical conditions (if-else)
Performing simple calculations
Working with more complex loops (nested for loops and while)
courseSuitableFor: The course is suitable for complete beginners, with no need for experience in technology or computer science.
MyExperience: In this section, I dive into my personal experience with the course and how it impacted my learning journey. I reflect on the knowledge and skills I gained, as well as the challenges I faced and how I overcame them. I discuss the teaching methods, the structure of the course, and whether they met my expectations.

Additionally, I share my thoughts on how engaging and interactive the lessons were, and how the course materials supported my learning process. This is where I evaluate the overall value of the course, including whether it met my goals and how it compares to my initial expectations.

Ultimately, this section offers a candid look at my journey through the course, highlighting what worked well, what could be improved, and how the course contributed to my personal and professional growth.
